summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Jeanne, regarding the ACATs for 'Jeepers' and 'Haze'. Amanda requests that Jeffrey sign and date the documents and return them, along with the JFP4 August statements. The email includes attachments related to the ACATs.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is sending an email regarding the ACATs for Jeepers and Haze, requesting signatures from Jeffrey.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is mentioned as the person who needs to sign and date the ACAT documents.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is the recipient of the email who is instructed to handle the documents after Jeffrey signs them.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is copied on the email, indicating he is also involved in the correspondence.

connections.description: Amanda is requesting Jeffrey to sign documents as part of his responsibilities.
Amanda is communicating with Jeanne regarding the handling of ACAT documents.
Paul is copied on the email, indicating a professional relationship.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA, 10154-0004
